featured.text: Being vegan means I try to stick to plant food.
We’ve been mostly vegan 90% of the time for the last 6 years and we cannot thank GreenBurger enough!
I’ve tried all kinds of vegan “burgers,” and GreenBurgers are closer to what I’m looking for.
In fact, I can have them every day—vegan or not!

definition.zh_def: 素食者：不食用任何動物產品的人，包括肉類、乳製品和蛋類。
definition.en_def: A person who does not consume any animal products, including meat, dairy, and eggs.
definition.example: She decided to become a vegan for health and ethical reasons.
